DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigating the absorption, metabolism and excretion of radio labelled single doses of idalopirdine in healthy men.
DOC.brief_title: Investigating the Absorption, Metabolism and Excretion (AME) of Idalopirdine
DOC.criteria: Healthy men aged between 4060 years (inclusive) BMI in the range 19 and 30 kg/m2 (minimum weight 60 kg) The subject has previously been dosed with idalopirdine. Other protocol defined inclusion and exclusion criteria do apply
